theRhythmGirl:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

theRhythmGirl:BeatPower.NAME: Beat
DESCRIPTIONS: Current beat. Has no effect of itself, but may affect the behaviour of other cards.

theRhythmGirl:MeasurePower.NAME: Measure
DESCRIPTIONS: Current Measure. Has no effect of itself, but may affect the behaviour of other cards.

theRhythmGirl:DoubleUpPower.NAME: Double Up
DESCRIPTIONS: The first attack you play each turn is played twice.
